dmca.title: [ABUSE] stolen images
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Friday, June 02, 2006 10:42 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] stolen images]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] stolen images]


For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] stolen images
Date:         Fri, 2 Jun 2006 07:30:42 -0700
From:         MaxV <maxv2005@gmail.com>
Reply-To:         MaxV <maxv2005@gmail.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Hello there,
one of the websites hosted by you, has many stolen images and use of
them without permission of the photographers. I am one of the
photographers. That site's owner has violated the copyrights. I am
asking you to deactivate that website or at least contact the owner to
take the all images down.

website: www.goldenlockss.com <http://www.goldenlockss.com/>

Thank you

Max V.
